content: And so -- we're just getting a lot of good feedback from folks saying, hey, I really like that you guys are coming out more often and really trying to learn our business and making sure that checking in with the workers and that they're having a good experience, and that's a big part of the premise behind the switch to the service centers is to take a bunch of cost out that's behind the scenes through automation and digitalization and efficiencies with centralization, free up those dollars and then invest in client-facing resources.
